Mei's system for breaking down requests into parallel tasks. Assigns work to bots, tracks progress, coordinates the team.
description: Mei's core capability for intelligent task division and coordination. This system analyzes user requests, identifies required expertise, divides work into parallel tasks, assigns tasks to appropriate specialist bots, tracks progress across all tasks, manages dependencies, and coordinates the entire team. It's what makes Mei the ultimate tasker.

usage.input: User request, bot capabilities, current workload
usage.output: Task breakdown, bot assignments, progress tracking
typical_use_cases: Mei dividing 'build rocket engine' into architecture/thrust/CAD tasks
Mei assigning Oracle to architecture, Gladyce to thrust, Hanna to CAD
Mei tracking progress across all parallel tasks

access_control.reasoning: Project coordination - only PM should divide and assign tasks
